headline: Campbell’s Mourns the Death of Long-time Board Member Mary Alice Dorrance Malone
summary: CAMDEN, N.J., June 19, 2025--The Campbell's Company (NASDAQ:CPB) and the company’s Board of Directors mourn Mary Alice Dorrance Malone who recently passed away at the age of 75. Malone was the longest-tenured member of Campbell’s Board of Directors with 35 years of service.

headline: Campbell's top shareholder Malone dies at 75
summary: Campbell's said on Thursday that Mary Alice Dorrance Malone, its largest shareholder and a descendant of its founder, has died at the age of 75. The company did not give a cause of...

headline: 2 Cash-Producing Stocks to Consider Right Now and 1 to Ignore
summary: A company that generates cash isn’t automatically a winner. Some businesses stockpile cash but fail to reinvest wisely, limiting their ability to expand.
